body_html:
@ywwbill I don't have any PCs with Windows 7 presently. So maybe someone that can build it successfully can upload a package. BTW my code is hosted here. The tutorial (in Chinese) for building it is here.
@Neltherion Yes, we need official support for Windows by the official dev team!
body_text:
@ywwbill I don't have any PCs with Windows 7 presently. So maybe someone that can build it successfully can upload a package.  BTW my code is hosted here. The tutorial (in Chinese) for building it is here.
@Neltherion Yes, we need official support for Windows by the official dev team!
body:
@ywwbill I don't have any PCs with Windows 7 presently. So maybe someone that can build it successfully can upload a package.  BTW my code is hosted [here](https://github.com/peterjc123/pytorch/tree/windows). The tutorial (in Chinese) for building it is [here](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/26849292). 
@Neltherion Yes, we need **official** support for Windows by the official dev team!
